forms

Class LoginForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • forms.LoginForm

  • public class LoginForm
extends java.lang.Object
    All forms needed when logging a candidate, admin or company in are provided by this very class.
    Author:
    Ben-Malik TCHAMALAM

      • isPasswordForgotten

        public boolean isPasswordForgotten()
        Asks if the password was forgotten or not.
        Returns:
        true if the user enter y or Y. Note that the given input is converted to lower case.

      • getNewPassword

        public java.lang.String getNewPassword()
        Takes a new password when user forgets their password.
        Returns:
        The String value of the new password entered by the user.
